North Kansas City, MO
64116 | date_opened = | names_pre = | date_closed = | casino_type = [[riverboat casino|Riverboat]] | theme = [[Carnival]] | owner = [[Caesars Entertainment]] | architect = | license_holder = | rooms = 392 | space_gaming = | shows = | attractions = | notable_restaurants = The Range | renovations = | website = [http://www.harrahsnkc.com/casinos/harrahs-north-kansas-city/hotel-casino/property-home.shtml harrahsnkc.com] }} '''Harrah's North Kansas City''' is a [[riverboat casino]] in [[North Kansas City, Missouri]]. It is located just north of [[Kansas City, Missouri]] on the [[Missouri River]]. ==Overview== Harrah's North Kansas City has over 1,800 [[slot machines]] and table games and video games. Harrah's has 6 restaurants on the property. ==See also== *[[List of casinos in Missouri]] ==External links== *[http://www.harrahsnkc.com/casinos/harrahs-north-kansas-city/hotel-casino/property-home.shtml Official Site] {{Caesars Entertainment}} {{Kansas City MSA}} [[Category:Caesars Entertainment Corporation]] [[Category:Kansas City metropolitan area]] [[Category:Economy of Kansas City, Missouri]] [[Category:Visitor attractions in Kansas City, Missouri]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Clay County, Missouri]]
